title: Seattle Meetup This Wednesday
summary:
Key ideas: 
- Scott is hosting a meetup in Seattle as part of the Meetups Everywhere tour.
- Anyone is invited to come, regardless of whether they are a typical SSC reader or feel awkward about it.
- The meetup will take place on Wednesday, October 2 at The Territory (house).

Key learnings: 
- Meetups Everywhere tour is an opportunity for SSC readers to connect with each other.
- It is possible to overcome social anxiety and attend meetups.
- Hosting or attending meetups can create a sense of community and belonging.

Key questions: 
- Who will be attending the Seattle meetup?
- How can attendees connect with each other during and after the meetup?
- Are there any particular topics or activities planned for the meetup?
